title: romane chouteau
subtitle: creative developer
description:
Hi! I’m Romane Chouteau, a 20 year old creative developer based in Vincennes (94). I love creating interactive experiences and websites, challenging myself to make unusual content. I also love pastabox Bolognese :)
Currently studying at Gobelins School of Image, I am looking for an apprenticeship job starting in October 2021 for my master’s degree. Maybe you are everything i’m looking for?
